docs.title: 🌍 UnScene-AutoDrive
docs.text:
A Unified Suite for Autonomous Driving in Unstructured Scenes

UnScene-AutoDrive is the official entry point to a family of research projects addressing the challenges of autonomous driving in rugged, irregular, and label-sparse environments.

docs.title: 🔗 Ecosystem Projects
docs.text:
• UnsOcc: Semantic 3D occupancy prediction with render-aware fusion.
  • UnSceneDrive: End-to-end driving with vision-language reasoning.
  • UnSceneData: Dataset tools for open-pit mines and off-road scenes.

docs.title: Tasks
docs.text:
• 3D Semantic Occupancy Prediction
  • mIoU, class-balanced accuracy

  • Rare class recall

  • End-to-End Planning

  • ADE / FDE
  • Route success rate
  • Collision-free metrics

docs.title: Dataset Support
docs.text: Dataset Structured Unstructured nuScenes ✅ ⚠️ Limited Waymo ✅ ❌ Mining Pit ❌ ✅

docs.title: 📚 Citation
docs.text:
If you use any part of the UnScene-AutoDrive suite, please cite the corresponding repository:

@misc{unscene2025,
  title={UnScene-AutoDrive: A Unified Suite for Autonomous Driving in Unstructured Scenes},
  author={Your Name et al.},
  year={2025},
  url={https://github.com/your-org/UnScene-AutoDrive}
}

docs.title: UnsOcc
docs.text:
Occupancy prediction in sparse, irregular environments.

  • RenderFusion + GSRefine for enhanced voxel and BEV accuracy.
  • Robust across long-tail semantic categories.

docs.title: UnSceneDrive
docs.text:
End-to-end driving policy with chain-of-thought reasoning.

  • LLaVA-based multi-modal input handling.
  • Closed-loop planning and reasoning.

docs.title: UnSceneData
docs.text:
Dataset construction and preprocessing tools.

  • nuScenes / Waymo to UnScene format
  • Mining pit dataset parser
